categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Zarus was a Human male who served as Field General of the Sith Empire during the Cold War.

Stationed on Balmorra, Zarus was a part of the Imperial military forces guarding the Balmorran Arms Factory. He was killed by a Republic-aligned spacer during a joint Republic and Balmorran resistance operation to weaken Imperial presence in the area.
